properties.displayName: Active Directory Structure Export Via Ldifde.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "-f" and (FolderPath endswith "\\ldifde.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "ldifde.exe")) and (not(ProcessCommandLine contains " -i"))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the execution of "ldifde.exe" in order to export organizational Active Directory structu
